title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Module for Enhancing Registered Nurses' Role Awareness in Clinical Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice concepts and foundational understanding of clinical environments
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the 8 informal roles of registered nurses in clinical practice.
Learners can analyze the impact of registered nurses' role perceptions on student learning through case-specific evaluations.
Learners can develop coping strategies for role conflict scenarios via simulation cases presented in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
